src:
Najbogatejša Slovenka ima novo ime, vam je všeč?
Iza Login se je odločila še za eno ime.
05 Nov 2019, 15:25 by N. Č.



Iza Login in Tanja Skaza. FOTO: Youtube, zaslonski posnetek



Tanja Skaza in Iza Login. FOTO: Mediaspeed


Iza Login, ki jo je aplikacija Govoreči maček Tom skupaj s soprogom Samom Loginom zavihtela na vrh lestvice najbogatejših Slovencev, se je ponovno preimenovala. Potem ko je na sodišču dosegla začasno odredbo prepovedi pogovora o njunem zasebnem življenju in njunem rojstnem imenu in priimku, preden sta postala Iza in Samo Login, je Loginova svojemu imenu dodala še Sia in postala Iza Sia Login.Kot piše portal Najlepša imena, se je pri nas ime Sia začelo pojavljati v zadnjih letih – v Sloveniji je 78 deklic s tem imenom. Sicer pa je to ime poznano v skandinavskih državah. Gre za različico tamkajšnjega imena Si, ki izvira iz imen Signe ter Sigrid v pomenu 'zmaga' (sigr) in 'lep, ljubljen' (fríđr) – 'lepa zmaga' torej. Pogosto pa ime Sia razlagamo kot moderno, tričrkovno različico imen, ki vsebujejo 'sia'. Med temi je najpogostejša razlaga iz imena Sofija, kar pomeni 'modrost'. Kitajci uporabljajo ime Xia ('sja'), na katero se prav tako lahko navezuje naša Sia (s pomenoma 'poletje' in 'rožnat oblak').
Loginova v Sloveniji napovedala številna predavanja
Zakonca Login po prodaji svojega govorečega mačka nista počivala na lovorikah, temveč sta se s svojim novim podjetjem Fundacijo Login5 s sedežem v Lihtenštajnu začela posvečati razvoju rešitev globalnih problemov človeštva (s sloganom Čist zrak. Čista voda. Čista zavest.). Zadnje objave fundacije sicer segajo v lanski februar.


Tanja Skaza in Iza Login. FOTO: Mediaspeed

V začetku tega leta se je Loginova povezala s Tanjo Skaza, ki je takrat nepričakovano zapustila direktorsko mesto svojega podjetja Skaza. Skupaj sta postali učiteljici, »kako zgraditi svetovno uspešno podjetje«.Loginova je hkrati tudi učiteljica manifestacije tehnik osebnega kreiranja in v naslednjih dneh čakajo števila predavanja. Na konferenci Kids Conference bo razkrila, kako doseči izjemen poslovni uspeh, harmonično zvezo in globok odnos z otroki, na Mariborskem maratonu pozitivne psihologije bo predavala o zavestnem kreiranju svoje realnosti in o tem, kako je notranje osvobajanje pomembno za uspeh, že konec meseca pa jo čaka projekt s Tanjo Skaza Začuti 100, za katerega napovedujeta, da bo »dogodek, kot ga še ni bilo« (vstopnica znaša 420 evrov). Tudi Skazova na spletu najraje objavlja inspirativne citate. Sama meni, da ni denar največje darilo življenja, temveč prijateljstvo. Pred kratkim je napisala tudi knjigo Sprememba vredna.
text:
The richest Slovenian woman has a new name, do you like it?
Beyond Login has decided on another name.
05 Nov 2019, 15:25 by N. Č.



Behind Login in Tanja Skaza. PHOTO: Youtube, Screenshot



Tanja Skaza and Behind Login. PHOTO: Mediaspeed


Behind the Login, which the Talking Cat Tom app, along with his wife Sam Login, rolled to the top of the list of the richest Slovenes, was renamed again. After reaching an interim injunction in court to talk about their personal life and their first and last name before becoming Iza and Samo Login, Loginova added Sia to her name and became Iza Sia Login. the name Sia began to appear in Slovenia in recent years - there are 78 girls with this name in Slovenia. Otherwise, this name is known in the Scandinavian countries. It is a version of the Si name there, which is derived from the names Signe and Sigrid in the sense of 'victory' (sigr) and 'beautiful, beloved' (fríđr) - 'beautiful victory', therefore. Often, however, the name Sia is interpreted as a modern, three-letter version of names containing 'sia'. Of these, the most common interpretation is from the name Sofia, meaning 'wisdom'. The Chinese use the name Xia ('shine'), which can also be referenced by our Sia (meaning 'summer' and 'pink cloud').
Loginova announced numerous lectures in Slovenia
After selling their talking cat, Login and the spouses did not rest on their laurels, but with their new company, the Liechtenstein-based Login5 Foundation, began to devote themselves to developing solutions to global problems of humanity (using the slogan Clean Air. Clean Water. Clean Consciousness.). The Foundation's latest announcements go back to February last year.


Tanja Skaza and Behind Login. PHOTO: Mediaspeed

Earlier this year, Loginova hooked up with Tanja Skaza, who unexpectedly left the directorship of her Skaza company. Together, they have become teachers of "how to build a globally successful business." At the Kids Conference, she will reveal how to achieve outstanding business success, a harmonious relationship and a deep relationship with children, and at the Marathon Marathon of Positive Psychology, she will lecture on consciously creating her reality and on how inner liberation is important for success, and at the end of the month awaits project with Tanja Skaza Feels 100, which they predict will be "an event like it hasn't been" (ticket is $ 420). Skazova also likes to post inspirational quotes online. She believes that money is not the greatest gift of life, but friendship. She also recently wrote a book called Change Worth It.
